Timeline

To know more about me...

  • 2017-now

    Product Owner

    From the user research to the conception of the interface and the evaluation of the product, responsible of build the right product for the right people at the right time. Building the product with people and for people, in an inclusive approach. Available for contracts, you can contact me for more informations.

  • 2011-17

    Product Manager and Web Quality Responsible - Wonderful

    Product Manager (2011-2017) and Web Quality Responsible (2014-2017) in the Wonderful's consulting agency. Multi-product management, manager of the product roadmap and improvements. Definition and monitoring of the product vision and key performance indicators (KPIs). Tracking the delivery produced during Scrum and Lean releases. Web quality Responsible and quality management of the agency's site park. Conduct workshops on the user experience (design workshops sprint, crazy 8, etc.) as well as on Web quality (website audit practice and Opquast training for certification to 10 people at the agency) and on product management (product box workshops). Manager of the client budget, in charge of budget reporting on management tools (LogiPub and Domino) and co-head of management of the cluster. Conduct user interviews, user journeys and user tests. Definition of personas, user paths and usage scenarios through user stories. Design of wireframes (under Sketch) and low-fi prototypes (under Marvel). Implementation of back office training, Google Analytics and social media strategy. See the website of Wonderful agency.

  • 2014-2017

    Co-organization Sud Web conference

    President of Sud Web association (2015-2017). Co-organization of the annual itinerant conference cycle in the South of France "Sud Web" in 2015 in Montpellier, in 2016 in Bordeaux and in 2017 in Aix-en-Provence. Conferences over 2 days: a day focus on talks and lightnings talks about feedbacks to feed our thoughts, open to other cultures and better understand the different professions of the Web and a self-organized day in open forum format where all participants become the actors of the day by co-designing the program. Involvement in defining the vision of the team through facilitation of workshops, the program (setting up an open forum on the 2nd day vs scheduled workshops, curation speakers), training speakers, sponsoring (search for sponsors and retrospective after event), logistics (choice of places, catering, mailings, etc.), facilitation on the day. See the website of Sud Web.

  • 2016-2017

    Co-organization Flupa UX-Days conferences

    Member of the Flupa board, French-speaking association of the professionals of the user experience. Member of the Flupa teams committee, French-speaking network (France, Luxembourg and Belgium), co-organizer of Flupa UX-Days 2017 (the big annual event), co-organizer of the life of Flupa association and co-organizer of Montpellier UX Flupa (afterworks organization, user testing workshops, etc.). Involvement in the research, selection and training of speakers, searching for sponsorship and internal organization of the association. See the website of Flupa UX-Days.

  • 25 and 26 november 2016

    Co-organization of the 1st UX Barcamp Flupa in France (Bordeaux)

    Co-organization of the 1st UX Barcamp Flupa in France, realised at Bordeaux (France). Co-organization of the event and co-facilitation of the UX Barcamp day. See the website of UX Barcamp (2016).

  • 2016

    Professor of Web Quality (Opquast) - WIS School

    Conception of courses about the learning of Web Quality and Opquast (Open Quality Standards) referential. Student's formation in France of Web Quality. Organization of workshops on Web Quality throught the wireframing steps and website's audits. Student's preparation to the Opquast certification and animation of workshops.

  • 2015

    Opquast certification

    Obtention of the Opquast certification (1st French certification) throught Responsible of Web Quality on the Opquast Partners network.

  • 2015

    Co-redaction of the product definition chapter product - Scrum book (4 edition) by Claude Aubry

    Co-redaction of the 14 chapter about the product definition in the Scrum book by the author: Claude Aubry. Vulgarization of the UX design concept in the agile methodology.

  • 2014

    Web Quality Responsible - Opquast partners

    Evolution of my rule in the Wonderful agency with the hat of Web Quality Responsible. Formation with Elie Sloïm and Laurent Denis in 2014, integration of the Opquast partners network, annual sharing at the office of Mozilla every year.

Contact

If you wanna talk with me around a good coffee or just know more informations with a simple mail, feel free to contact me:

Legal mentions

Web accessibility audit and coordination

### Missions - Definition of the product vision and the product roadmap - Definition of personas based on a secondary school basis - Writing user stories including good quality web-based on OPQUAST referential and RGAA3 silver level (AA) - Prototyping the interface with a first mobile approach - Monitoring and coordination (Scrum method) - Functional tests and quality assurance throughout the iterations - Maintenance of the platform according to prioritized user feedbacks - Accessibility audit of the site based on the RGAA3 silver standard (AA)

Supporting approach on the production of the site and accessibility audit on the basis of the RGAA3 level AA

  • Client:

    Fédération des Aveugles de France
  • Date:

    2017

Establishment of an international loyalty program

### Missions - Implementation of business rules (user stories) - Generation and traceability of unique codes (technical and security aspects) - Contract with an international promotional insurance - Establishment of legal cover - Statistical and behavioral data analyzes

Follow-up of the loyalty program with the marketing of billions of unique codes applicated on the Pink Lady® and PinKids® apple trays as well as on apples sold in bulk internationally (15 European countries). Implementation of the program in 2013 and several releases until 2017.

  • Client:

    Pink Lady®
  • Date:

    2017

Wonder PO Schools - Training Product Owners

### Missions - Definition of the Product Owners's training plan - Organization and facilitation of UX workshops & product box - Support team PO on use case to facilitate the rise in skills - Individual interviews - Web quality training with weekly training - Oversight exams: OPQUAST Web quality certification

Internal project of upgrade skills and Product Owners's training. Facilitation of weekly workshops on agile methodologies and UX design. Facilitation of many practical workshops on use case. Web quality training and weekly training towards the OPQUAST quality Web certification. Oversight on the exam and 10 OPQUAST certified people.

  • Client:

    Wonderful
  • Date:

    2017

User centered approach on an e-commerce application

### Missions - User interviews conduct (done internally, as well as towards clients and prospects) - User research - Definition of personas resulting from the secondary research - A focus group animation with clients and prospects - Implementation of a product roadmap - Design of wireframes and user flow - Follow-up on an hybrid application development (Cordova) integrating the management of a product catalog - Multi-device testing

User-centered support approach on the realization of a B2B and B2C e-commerce hybrid application.

  • Client:

    Exaprint
  • Date:

    2015

User research and product analysis

### Missions - Product strategy (Running Lean methodology, lean canvas) - User research - User Interviews - Personas - Wireframes - Customer journey on the checkout process - Focus group animation to analyse the product's positioning and pretest wireframes - A/ B Testing

User research process to check if the product designed is the right product that meets the expectations of users after setting up an MVP.

  • Client:

    Bibelo
  • Date:

    2016

Label OPQUAST Website on Roquefort Société

Missions

  • Repository quality audit OPQUAST Website 2.2
  • Analysis the results of the audit and implementation optimizations on the user stories’ process
  • Monitoring and coordination of optimizations
  • OPQUAST Good customer practice training on web quality
  • Quality management over 2 years

Audit and coordination on the labeling process OPQUAST Website on the website www.roquefort-societe.com.

  • Client:

    Roquefort Société
  • Date:

    2014
